availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Morgan County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Margaret "Peggy" Adkins in Morgan County on October 19, 1840. Father of Pretta Whitt, William Whitt, Cornelius Whitt, Sarrah Whitt, Mary Whitt, Miles Whitt, George M. Whitt, and Margaret Whitt. Farmer in Morgan County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Morgan County, District 1, p. 24.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Elliott County, Precinct 1, p. 34.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Morgan County Marriages, Film #000839918, p. 170.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Morgan County, KY, October 1863, p. 170 (Accessed via ancestry.com).
Birth and Death Records: Covington, Lexington, Louisville, and Newport â€“ Microfilm (before 1911), KDLA, Roll #7016144, All County Deaths, p. 361.
